Anyone else having problems with Episode 2 and 5 not working? I havent tried to see if any others aren't working but so far those two havent,

If you are having problems with your episodes then you need to do a "Hash Check" on your files. It's a way of testing whether your downloads were corrupted somehow, about 1 out of every 10 have been corrupted for me, but a hash check will catch it and redownload the corrupted portions.

Cheers!
